radiographic_examinations.findings: Heavy mitral annular calcifications, bibasilar atelectasis, scattered millimetric hypodensities within the liver, several hypodensities within the right kidney consistent with simple cysts, dilated appendix measuring 1.2 cm with surrounding inflammatory changes, small hiatal hernia, moderate atherosclerotic calcifications in abdominal aorta, and moderate degenerative changes in the lower lumbar spine.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Several hypodensities within the right kidney are present and consistent with simple cysts, the largest measuring approximately 8.6 x 9.5 cm, minimally increased relative to prior examination; a cortical hypodensity from the lower pole of the left kidney is unchanged; small hiatal hernia is similar in size relative to prior study.
